Return Value Capturing
[Sensor Placement]

Capturing Return Values of functions. More...

Defines

#define DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_BOOL(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN__(dynatrace_bool_t, BOOL, return_value)
 Marks the end of a sensor, captures a bool return value and returns it.

 Marks the end of a sensor, captures a char return value and returns it.

#define DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_STRING(return_value)   __DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN__(const char *, STRING, return_value)
 Marks the end of a sensor, captures a zero-terminated 7-bit ASCII (or EBCDIC on zOS) string return value and returns it.
#define DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_STRING_WITH_CHARSET(return_value, length, ccsid)   __DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_2__(const char *, STRING_WITH_CHARSET, return_value, length, ccsid)
 Marks the end of a sensor, captures a string of the specified length (in bytes) and codeset (CCSID) as return value and returns it.

Detailed Description

Capturing Return Values of functions. 

int answer_to_life_the_universe_and_everything(void) {
    DYNATRACE_ENTER();
    ...
    DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_INT32(42);
}

#define DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_STRING ( return_value   )     __DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN__(const char *, STRING, return_value)

Marks the end of a sensor, captures a zero-terminated 7-bit ASCII (or EBCDIC on zOS) string return value and returns it.

Remarks:
The maximum string length captured depends on the dynaTrace Agent.

#define DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_STRING_WITH_CHARSET ( return_value,
length,
ccsid   )     __DYNATRACE_EXIT_RETURN_2__(const char *, STRING_WITH_CHARSET, return_value, length, ccsid)

Marks the end of a sensor, captures a string of the specified length (in bytes) and codeset (CCSID) as return value and returns it.

Remarks:
The maximum string length captured depends on the dynaTrace Agent.
